Man, at least end it with another NTR (netori) sequel. We can see Sakura and her "new owner" which means Haru was able to take her back. I can even imagine how Haru didn't even realize Sakura was once stolen and he was able to steal her back. This also means despite her owner registration was changed, she was still be able to be by Haru side all while under her owner domination. Kinda impressive if you think about it since she kinda fought her own natural system.
